item.title: ufw: List Rules in Ubuntu Machine
item.description: root@xxx:/var/log# ufw status Status: active To Action From -- ------ ---- 22 LIMIT Anywhere 80 ALLOW Anywhere 443 ALLOW Anywhere ??41908/tcp ALLOW Anywhere Anywhere ALLOW 115.85.11.98 25/tcp ALLOW Anywhere 4444/tcp ALLOW Anywhere 4444/udp ALLOW Anywhere 22 (v6) LIMIT Anywhere (v6) 80 (v6) ALLOW Anywhere (v6) 443 (v6) ALLOW Anywhere (v6) 41908/tcp (v6) ALLOW Anywhere (v6) 25/tcp (v6) ALLOW Anywhere (v6) 4444/tcp (v6) ALLOW Anywhere (v6) 4444/udp (v6) ALLOW Anywhere (v6)
